title: Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Children can stop by the visitor center and ask for a copy of our Junior Ranger booklet. Or see them here: Junior Ranger for grade school  (pdf, 116 KB) Junior Ranger for preschool  (pdf, 131 KB)
